title: Let's Talk About Models - here since apparently gameplay has nothing to do with the area of movement
body:
Does anyone else feel like the game's models are becoming too large for the screen and lanes? Even at full zoom out I can barely fit some of the champs on my 1920x1080 screen. the lanes are also ridiculously clustered since minions cant be navigated through without phantom dancer or ghost. it's a good thing that more often than not we dont see all of leagues super heavyweight division champs in a game. if 10 of those were in a single lane or baron/dragon pit it'd be impossible to move. i like the detailed models, but there needs to be a bit more space to move around and possibly a further away camera.

------------------------------------

I don't get how this is meant for story, art, and sound since I'm not talking about the art at all, but instead the gameplay elements.

replies.body:
Actually, I think many of the models are way too small. Malphite comes to mind first off.

I have never had issues moving my character freely in a game, even in aram.
i have a few times. i've actually killed players who have gotten stuck between a minion swarm on the corner wall.
